text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the moonlight
Shadows all around us
Every step feels so right
Hearts are beating loudest

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the cool night
Stars they watch and listen
Holding hands we take flight
In our world we glisten

[Chorus]
Moonlight
Moonlight
Feel the magic in the air
Moonlight
Moonlight
Lost in moments we will share

[Verse 3]
Underneath the silver glow
Promises we're making
In the stillness let it grow
Every wish we're taking

[Chorus]
Moonlight
Moonlight
Feel the magic in the air
Moonlight
Moonlight
Lost in moments we will share

[Bridge]
In this quiet night we'll find
All our dreams unspoken
In each other's eyes we bind
A love that's never broken
title: In the Moonlight
